item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 22, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PyTorch Internals: Ezyang's Blog (158 points | 12 comments)
2. Map Features in OpenStreetMap with Computer Vision (47 points | 1 comment)
3. California AG Rob Bonta Urgently Issues Consumer Alert for 23andMe Customers (87 points | 40 comments)
4. Landrun: Sandbox any Linux process using Landlock, no root or containers (139 points | 32 comments)
5. Tencent's 'Hunyuan-T1'–The First Mamba-Powered Ultra-Large Model (23 points | 12 comments)
6. Show HN: FastOpenAPI – automated docs for many Python frameworks (82 points | 40 comments)
7. Paul A. M. Dirac, Interview by Friedrich Hund (1982) [video] (42 points | 6 comments)
8. Bra and KET: String Interpolation in AmigaDOS (12 points | discuss)
9. Understanding R1-Zero-Like Training: A Critical Perspective (69 points | 9 comments)

11. Hubble Captures Vivid Auroras in Jupiter's Atmosphere (23 points | 6 comments)
12. Monster Cables picked the wrong guy to threaten (2008) (475 points | 156 comments)
13. Crabtime: Zig’s Comptime in Rust (355 points | 99 comments)
14. Facebook to stop targeting ads at UK woman after legal fight (88 points | 60 comments)
15. Scallop – A Language for Neurosymbolic Programming (166 points | 45 comments)
16. Blue Ghost lander captures sunset shots on moon before falling silent (42 points | 4 comments)
17. Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning (2022) (378 points | 52 comments)
18. IETF setting standards for AI preferences (17 points | 4 comments)
19. Locks, leases, fencing tokens, FizzBee (33 points | 7 comments)
20. When you deleted /lib on Linux while still connected via SSH (2022) (89 points | 50 comments)
21. Trapping misbehaving bots in an AI Labyrinth (15 points | 2 comments)
22. The Cybernetic Teammate (21 points | 6 comments)
23. IronRDP: a Rust implementation of Microsoft's RDP protocol (498 points | 203 comments)
24. Horror on the coast of Oaxaca, a tourist paradise plagued by mass disappearances (10 points | 2 comments)
25. Use Long Options in Scripts (239 points | 122 comments)
26. Show HN: AGX – Open-Source Data Exploration for ClickHouse (The New Standard?) (32 points | 2 comments)
27. Frink (188 points | 32 comments)
28. France rejects backdoor mandate (898 points | 258 comments)
29. Global population datasets underrepresent rural population (200 points | 80 comments)
30. ‘Bluey’s World’: How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a Juggernaut (325 points | 278 comments)
